price: 20. quusi siinih teetil (baaxo kinnuk) hayne, xayloo kee lacay tuxxiq edde litoonuy rizqhi как siinil anee waa siinih ginne.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
